title: Mecha-ude (Mechanical Arms)
synopsis: Long ago, alien lifeforms came to Earth, fusing with people on the planet. Due to their appearance, they were dubbed "Mecha-ude," as when fused, they bore a striking resemblance to mechanized limbs.
voices: ['Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Toyonaga, Toshiyuki', 'Eve', 'Park, Romi', 'Ishikawa, Kaito', 'Ishikawa, Kaito', 'Shimamura, Yuu']
